citations.narrative:
The primary enclosure for the hedgehog has a bar the is rusted on the side of the enclosure just above the height of the
hedgehog. It is creating sharp points that the hedgehog could reach while standing on its hind legs.
The facility must be constructed of such material and of such strength as appropriate for the animals involved. The indoor
and outdoor housing facilities shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals
from injury and to contain the animals. All housing facilities for animals must be structurally sound and maintained in good
repair. To be corrected by October 24, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The primary enclosure for the hedgehog has a bar the is rusted on the side of the enclosure just above the height of the 
hedgehog. It is creating sharp points that the hedgehog could reach while standing on its hind legs.  
The facility must be constructed of such material and of such strength as appropriate for the animals involved. The indoor 
and outdoor housing facilities shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals 
from injury and to contain the animals. All housing facilities for animals must be structurally sound and maintained in good 
repair. To be corrected by October 24, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
